_init: function(container)
Initializes the object.
_sendOnClose: function()
Internal routine.
_updateDebugBounds: function()
Called by a subclass when its bounds change, to update the debugging rectangles on screen.
addOnClose: function(referenceElement,
callback)
The given callback will be called when the Subscribable fires its onClose.
arrange: function(items,
bounds,
options)
Arranges the given items in a grid within the given bounds, maximizing item size but maintaining standard tab aspect ratio for each
customize: function(func)
Allows you to customize the tab representations as they are created.
Repaints the thumbnail with the given resolution, and forces it to stay that resolution until unforceCanvasSize is called.
getBounds: function()
Returns a copy of the Item’s bounds as a Rect.
getTopLevelItems: function()
Returns an array of all Items not grouped into groups.
getZ: function()
Returns the zIndex of the Item.
init: function()
Set up the necessary tracking to maintain the Mirrors.
item: function(el)
Given a DOM element representing an Item, returns the Item.
pausePainting: function()
Tells the TabMirror to stop updating thumbnails (so you can do animations without thumbnail paints causing stutters).
pushAway: function()
Pushes all other items away so none overlap this Item.
window.Rect = function(a,
top,
width,
height)
If a is a Rect, creates a copy of it.
removeOnClose: function(referenceElement)
Removes the callback associated with referenceElement for onClose notification.
resumePainting: function()
Undoes a call to pausePainting.
setPosition: function(left,
top,
immediately)
Moves the Item to the specified location.
setSize: function(width,
height,
immediately)
Resizes the Item to the specified size.
triggerPaint: function()
Forces the mirror in question to update its thumbnail.
unforceCanvasSize: function()
Stops holding the thumbnail resolution; allows it to shift to the size of thumbnail on screen.
